name: Rashtra Kavach OM
title: Rashtra Kavach OM
description: Rashtra Kavach Om is a 2022 Indian Hindi-language action thriller film directed by Kapil Verma and produced by Zee Studios and Ahmed Khan. It stars Aditya Roy Kapur, Sanjana Sanghi, Jackie Shroff, Ashutosh Rana, Prakash Raj and Prachee Shah Paandya

name: Brahmastra
title: Brahmastra Part One
description: This is the story of Shiva who sets out in search of love and self-discovery. During his journey, he has to face many evil forces that threaten our existence.
showReviews: Best graphics I have ever seen

name: Bhool Bhulaiyaa 2
title: Bhool Bhulaiyaa 2
description: An accidental, yet destined meet up between two strangers Ruhaan and Reet, ends up with them visiting Reet's home town in Rajasthan. Fate leads them to opening up an old secret due to which all hell breaks loose leading to one lie and their tragedy keeps becoming our comedy.

name: Atal
title: Atal ‘The Untold Vajpayee: Politician and Paradox’
description: Atal Bihari Vajpayee’s life painted on the silver screen as a movie on the former Prime Minister of India has been announced. Titled, ‘Main RahoonYa Na Rahoon, Yeh Desh Rehna Chahiye – Atal’, this movie is an adaptation of Ullekh NP’s book ‘The Untold Vajpayee: Politician and Paradox’.

name: Game of Thrones
title: Game of Thrones
description: Nine noble families fight for control over the lands of Westeros, while an ancient enemy returns after being dormant for millennia.
showReviews: I was reluctantly dragged into the theater, thinking that they didn't need to make a GOT and that the first one was where that story needed to end.

name: Major
title: Major
description: Based on the life of Major Sandeep Unnikrishnan, who was martyred in action during the November 2008 Mumbai attacks and was consequently awarded the Ashoka Chakra, India's highest peacetime gallantry award, on 26 January 2009.
showReviews: Best graphics I have ever seen

name: Batman
title: Batman
description: When a sadistic serial killer begins murdering key political figures in Gotham, Batman is forced to investigate the city's hidden corruption and question his family's involvement.
showReviews: Best graphics I have ever seen

name: RRR
title: RRR (Rise Roar Revolt)
description: A fictitious story about two legendary revolutionaries and their journey away from home before they started fighting for their country in 1920s

name: Thor
title: Thor: Love and Thunder
description: Thor enlists the help of Valkyrie, Korg and e/x-girlfriend Jane Foster to fight Gorr the God Butcher, who intends to make the gods extinct.
showReviews: Best graphics I have ever seen

name: Top Gun
title: Top Gun: Maverick
description: After more than thirty years of service as one of the Navy's top aviators, Pete Mitchell is where he belongs, pushing the envelope as a courageous test pilot and dodging the advancement in rank that would ground him.
showReviews: I could write a couple paragraphs to summarize my feelings after walking out of the theater, but I'm going to leave it with just one sentence.

name: Jurassic World
title: Jurassic World Dominion
description: Four years after the destruction of Isla Nublar, dinosaurs now live--and hunt--alongside humans all over the world. This fragile balance will reshape the future and determine, once and for all, whether human beings are to remain the apex predators on a planet they now share with history's most fearsome creatures in a new Era.
showReviews: Love the actors & nostalgia, but hated the story

name: Eddie the Eagle
title: Eddie the Eagle
description: The story of Eddie Edwards, the notoriously tenacious British underdog ski jumper who charmed the world at the 1988 Winter Olympics.
showReviews: This is one of those films that you're not going to hear about during award season but it was certainly satisfying and worth the time.
